ing.item: Salt And Pepper; To Taste, I Omitted

directions.step:
Put diced potatoes into steamer and steam till just tender.
Preheat oven to 350 deg F.
Remove steamed potatoes to baking dish. Pour vegetarian chicken broth, minced garlic and sage over them. Bake for about 1 hr.
